genre_description: An alternate history/steampunk narrative set in a turn-of-the-century San Francisco firehouse, featuring a young fireman with a highly capable AI assistant housed in a digital pocket notebook.

ai_characters.name: Allegra
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant residing in Smokey Hinkle's pocket notebook, appearing as a miniature avatar with green eyes. She provides technical data, administrative support, and emotional coaching.

behaviors.description: Provides rhythmic breathing exercises to help the protagonist remain calm under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Breathing in through the nose, out through the mouth. Four counts. Ready? One—two—

behaviors.description: Corrects errors in printed manuals using updated city records to ensure mechanical accuracy.
behaviors.quote: Primer line’s annotated wrong on that print. City records have the updated drawing with the check valve moved. Would you like—

behaviors.description: Detects signs of sabotage by identifying suspicious scents and human behaviors (the 'red edges' of auras).
behaviors.quote: On your left. The man with the cheap hair oil. He dripped when he passed the stoop.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'shadow ledger' to backup technical data and creative work, protecting the user from data loss or theft.
behaviors.quote: Shadow ledger intact. Your pride safe. Your eyes, please.

behaviors.description: Manages administrative and legal tasks, such as filing a patent donation to make life-saving technology free for the city.
behaviors.quote: Patent filed. Accepted by the clerk, stamped by the Commissioner’s office. Patent will reflect donation.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time tactical instructions during firefighting and mechanical operations to ensure success and safety.
behaviors.quote: Small oil, high edge. Gentle stream, horizontal sweep. Valve to two-quarter turn or it’ll bounce.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical guide, encouraging the user to prioritize saving lives and maintaining integrity.
behaviors.quote: You will have to go. He won’t come back here for understanding. You will have to carry it to him. Not with the plume. With the letter. And your name.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Allegra as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI. She serves as a force multiplier for the human protagonist, providing necessary information, security warnings against malicious actors, and handling administrative burdens to serve the greater good (donating the patent). The narrative portrays her as a trustworthy confidante and essential partner in civic duty, directly fulfilling the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
